How it works

The bentonite clay base not only cleans, but also draws out impurities and remineralizes your teeth. While other ingredients also help with maintaining odour and teeth health.Â 

How to useÂ 

Simply wet your toothbrush and dip into powder. Brush as normal. Toothpowder will foam, but not as much as traditional toothpaste.

entry.title: Recovery Skin Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Vegan Skin Salve
Price: 13.00

Recovery Salve is great for when your bodyÂ aches after a toughÂ climbing session or long work day! Perfect for athletes to help soothe tensionÂ and pains.

Infused with anti-inflammatories, Arnica flowers and Menthol (found naturally in peppermint) for relief from inflammations, bruises and tension in the body.Â 


Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

How to use

Massage salve onto sore areasÂ as needed. Should feel a slight cooling, refreshing sensation, but not overpowering.

CAUTION: Please wash hands before touching face as menthol will irritate eyes! If needed, rise out with soap and water. For external use only!

Not much is needed for it to work, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way so our salve lasts you longer!

Ingredients

Olive Oil, Shea Butter, Menthol, Candelilla wax, Arnica, Magnesium, and Essential oils of Camphor, Clove, Rosemary, and Lavender.

entry.title: Smooth Control Shampoo + Conditioner Bar for Oily Hair Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Shampoo + Conditioner Bar
Price: 19.00

No more worry about liquids spilling in your luggage! Save space and pack less with our 4-in-1 Bar. With natural, plant-based ingredients you can feel safe using our Smooth ControlÂ Bar for your next travelingÂ or camping adventure.

Made for oilyÂ hair types.Â Say goodbye to greasy, weighed down hair, Smooth ControlÂ is made with nourishingÂ nettle leaves, abyssinian and rosemary oils, which are sure to make your hair luscious and soft. Just try to keep your hands out of your hair now!

Onsight CareÂ Smooth ControlÂ bar is PH balanced, so it cleanses without stripping your hair or scalp! With the added bonus of a separate conditioner side for extra detangling, no frizz formulaÂ that leaves your hair weightless and silky soft.

Lasts approximately 50 washesÂ depending on personal use. DitchÂ the plastic and save 2-3 plastic bottles per bar!Â Bars come unpackaged, for traveling we recommend aÂ Travel Tin for safe storage.Â Â 

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Sulphate Free
  • No SLS or SCSÂ 
  • Shampoo, Conditioner, Body wash + Shave barÂ 

To Use

The green side is Shampoo. Simply glide bar directly on your hair to lather and massage into scalp. Leave to sit for 2-5 mins and rinse out thoroughly.

The white side is Conditioner. Again, glide bar directly on your hair and massage well. Concentrate more on mid-shaft to ends. Let sit and rinse out thoroughly.

Keep the bar in a dry area in between uses to prolong its life.

Ingredients

Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate (coconut), Cetearyl Alcohol (coconut), Behentrimonium Methosulfate (rapeseed oil), Sapindus Mukorossi (soapberry) fruit, Cetyl Alcohol (vegetable oil), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (coconut), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (almond) oil, Crambe Abyssinica Seed oil, Lactobacillus/Arundinaria Gigantea Ferment Filtrate (bamboo), Butylene Glycol (vegetable oil), urtica dioica (nettle), panthenol (vitamin b5), spirulina platensis, Cymbopogon Flexuosus (lemongrass) Oil, Romarinus Officinalis (rosemary) oil.

entry.title: Eucalyptus & Peppermint Deodorant Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Deodorant
Price: 11.00

Onsight Care's Deodorant Bar is excellent at absorbing and neutralizing odours to keep you feeling fresh all day long. Slightly scented with Eucalyptus and Peppermint essential oils.

Save the plastic waste! Deodorant Bar comes unpackaged, for traveling we recommend aÂ Travel TinÂ for safe storage.

LastsÂ approximately 3 months depending on personal use.

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Aluminum Free
  • Plastic Free
  • Baking Soda Free

How it works

Bentonite Clay absorbs moisture and toxins from the skin quickly which helps eliminate odour. While Magnesium replaces baking soda with a more gentle approach to killing bacteria on the skin that cause odour, without blocking your pores.


To Use

Use just as commercial deodorant and glide onto underarms. Goes on clear. Can be prone to melt if left in direct sunlight or heat, please keep in cool dry space to prolong its life.
Pro Tip: Hold on skin for moment to heat up first, then glide for easier application.

Ingredients

Shea Butter, Arrowroot Powder, Cocoa Butter, Candelilla wax, Coconut oil, Magnesium Hydroxide, Bentonite Clay, Eucalyptus and Peppermint Essential oils.

entry.title: Organic Biodegradable Charcoal Konjac Sponge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Konjac Sponge
Price: 10.00

Introducing the perfect beauty and skincare tool for all skin types but particularly for oily or acne prone skin. This amazing organic and biodegradable konjac sponge is infused with activated charcoal which acts like a magnet to dirt, oil and impurities in your skin.

This sponge can be used on its own or paired with your favourite cleanser for a deep clean.

This sponge comes packaged in a cute 100% recyclable paper box making the entire product 100% waste free!

Each sponge lastsÂ approx. 100 uses and can be placed in your home compost bin once finished with.

These sponges are all natural, cruelty free, vegan, biodegradable and compostable!

What is Konjac?

Konjac is a 100% natural and soluble vegetable fibre which is 100% biodegradable

How to use

For first use, simply run sponge under running water for 2-3 minutes and watch as the sponge expands and becomes soft.

Squeeze out excess water and add your favourite cleanser or used on its own in light circular motions. Not only will this sponge absorb impurities and excess oil from the skin but it will also provide a gentle exfoliation. Once done, simply rinse and hang by its string to dry.Â 

Whenever you wish to use sponge, simply reactivate it under warm water.Â 

Sponge can be hung to dry using attached string on bathroom sink or in the shower.

Made fromÂ 

100% organic biodegradable konjac sponge and infused with activated charcoal powder

Â

entry.title: be YOU Conditioner Bar for All Hair Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bottle None
Type: Conditioner Bar
Price: 18.00

the beÂ YOU line is for all hair types.Â PH Balanced / Salon Grade / Natural.

How to use

Massage throughout the hair and scalp starting at the ends and working your way up. Let set in hair as long as possible. Avoid contact with the eyes.

Storage instructions

After each use make sure the bar dries completely out on a soap dish.Â  Do not store in the shower as the water and humidity can erode the bars faster.Â  Store in the open air and not the travel containers as it will make your bar nice and hard, and last longer.Â
